name: Ratatouille in Acorn Squash
keywords: acorn squash, vegetables, main course, vegan, vegetarian
recipeIngredient: 2 medium eggplants, peeled and cut into 1-inch cubes

recipeInstructions.text: Heat the oil over high heat in a large pot and saute the garlic, onion and all the peppers until they are soft, about 15 minutes. Add the zucchini, eggplant and tomatoes, and stir well.
Lower the heat to a simmer and cook for an hour and a half. Add the capers, salt and pepper during the last 15 minutes of cooking. Keep hot.
Halve the acorn squash, remove the seeds and place them, cut side down, on a baking sheet. Add one inch of boiling water. Bake for 45 minutes.
To serve, spoon some of the ratatouille into the cavity of each half.
